name: Hide My Ass
description: Are you tired of prying eyes all over your screen at work, in the open space ? Do you want to go on Facebook or your web mail without being spotted by others as the lazy guy ? This css will put all background in 'desert mode'. This will make them think you are on a old-fashioned and boring-to-death and work-related website. You may need to change it to a custom one (grey, white...) to a more corporate one. All images are by default in grey and black and almost transparent. Picture will appear with full opacity but sill in B&W if your mouse is over them only. This feature reduce the capability of a prying eye to deduce anything in your disadvantage. This feature is also to stop the usual suspicious behaviour (ALt+TAB) of the culprit which is a major hint that you were not working.
